I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.

content.text: Hi, I'm a wildlife photographer. I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
Hi, I'm an only child and I love traveling.
What's your favorite place you've traveled to?
I've been to Europe and Mexico and I love them both.
I've always wanted to go to Europe. What was your favorite part about it?
I loved the history and the food. I also loved the architecture.
I've heard that the food is really good in Europe. I'd love to try some traditional dishes.
You definitely should. There are so many great dishes to choose from.
I'm sure I'd love them all. I'm a big foodie.
I can tell. You're a wildlife photographer so you must love to eat healthy.
I do love to eat healthy, but I also love to indulge in some unhealthy foods every once in a while.
I can relate to that. I love to eat healthy, but I also love to eat junk food.
Me too. I think we'd make a great team.
I think so too. We can go on food adventures together.
That would be so much fun. I'm already excited.
Me too. I can't wait to try new foods with you.
